title: Carmo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Latin American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Makes traditionally-inspired dishes with vegan and vegetarian selections, such as the Carmo salad (rice, vegan smoked ham, raisins, avocado, cashews, almonds, pineapple, cucumbers, and scallions covered with citrus mango vinaigrette) and changing vegan specials.
